first.text: Hi Wilson! Thank you for calling Noodle Insurance onboarding help line. My name is Stacy. I will be your agent today. Based on our calculations, we have a policy of twenty thousands rands payout for 25 rands per month premium. Would you like this policy?

repeat.text: I was just saying,Noodle can offer you a policy of twenty thousands rands payout for 25 rands per month premium. Would you like this policy?

first.text: . How can I help you today?

repeat.text: I was just saying. How can I help you today

first.text: Can you please share the policy number you'd like to check.

repeat.text: Lets try this again. What is the policy number you would like to check?

what_policy_2.text: Lets try this again. What is the policy number you would like to check?

first.text: Thank you again for taking a policy with us. We will send you an sms with further details of your policy. Do you have any questions for me?

repeat.text: I was saying. Thank you for taking the policy with us. We will send you an sms with further details of your policy. Any questions you may have?

first.text: Thank you again for considering us. We continously review our cover options so we really hope to have something that suites better next time. Bye!

repeat.text: I was saying. We continously review our cover options and we will be happy to have something that resonates with your needs next time. Bye!

first.text: Okay, let me see here. It looks like
. Is there anything else I can help you with today?

repeat.text: I was just saying. It looks like
. Is there anything else I can help you with today?

first.text: I am so sorry to hear that you did not enjoy the experience. Can you please tell me what you feel could have been done better?

repeat.text: I said, sorry you feel this way. What might I have done btter?

first.text: You can redeem it if you like. Is there anything else I can help you with today?

repeat.text: We've already gone over your claim. There are no other claims associated with this account. Anything else I can help you with?

first.text: Absolutely. It looks like there is a bank account tied to your account with us. With your sign-off we will refund the claim value to your account. Would you like me to initiate this process?

repeat.text: I'm sorry, your claim has already been redeemed. What else can I help you with?

i_will_call_back.text: Okay, I'll call you later. Bye!

when_callback.text: When can I call you back?

first.text: I'm glad I could be of help. Bye!

repeat.text: I was saying. It was nice helping you. Bye Bye!

random.text: Sorry, could you say it again?
Sorry, the connection dropped for a second. Could you say that again?
Sorry, I didn't quite catch that.
Could you say it one more time?

dont_understand_hangup.text: I'm sorry I can barely hear you. I'll try to call you later! Bye!

dont_understand_forward.text: I'm sorry, let me transfer you to another agent. Please stand by!

yes_i_am_a_robot.text: Actually I am an advanced AI. Just don't tell my boss or I'll be out of a job.

repeat_question.text: Can you repeat the question, please?
